Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa™ Flu A/B & RSV Positive Control Pack
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Simplexa™ Flu A/B & RSV Direct assay and Positive Control Pack for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA from nasopharyngeal swabs using RT-PCR on the 3M Integrated Cycler.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs from patients with respiratory tract infection signs and symptoms, as an aid in differential diagnosis, used with the 3M Integrated Cycler; not for influenza C detection.
